overview: Owned and embittered, Pianitza never stops trolling Youtube until attracting Google's surveillance. Fortunately, TzaTza, his evil double, emerges from the bottom of the vapors and manages to eliminate El Goog, the matriarch of Google ... Following these events, the anger of the Podcasters and the Vlogeurs will quickly be felt ... Indeed, Pandora, the queen of the 420, will hand in hand, to the Patron of the Ohm (Ω) Company, command Xxx_YT_xxX which allows to control Youtube ... The Youtube community feels violated. A plan of attack against the intellectualism seems already to be prepared in the shade to put an end to the new hegemony of the Ohm Company on the Internet landscape ... Thus during his chronicle on Hotline Miami, Pianitza will be seen tumble into total madness. This will start with a phone call ...
title: Gotta Get A Grip
